item.title: Newton Physical Asset (NPA)
item.description: NEP 21: Newton Physical Asset (NPA) # Item Description NEP 21 Title Newton Physical Asset Author Ben Koo Discussions to https://github.com/newtonproject/NEPs/issues/21 Status Draft Type Standard Category Technical Created 2020-05-09 Updated Simple Summary # Newton Physical Asset (NPA) is the base class of physical asset classes.
